img_below_text:
Upon beginning your journey, you’ll be thrust into the role of the mythical Sun Wukong as he rebels against the Court of Heaven and its Heavenly Kings. Undaunted by their army, Sun Wukong calls them out, prompting the nephew of the Jade Emperor, Erlang Shen, to meet him in combat.
## Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity

img_summary: The image depicts Sun Wukong, the mythical protagonist, standing ready with his staff, facing three imposing and heavily armored figures in a snowy battlefield. This scene visually represents the beginning of Wukong's rebellion against the Court of Heaven, as described in the preceding and following text. It sets the tone for the epic confrontations and challenges ahead in the narrative.
